programme.title: Ouchen
programme.desc: The events revolve around Osama and his family who take cunning and deceit as a way of life, and after they stumble upon an old treasure map, they embark on a wild adventure to locate the treasure, while facing various unexpected situations.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: Dirou Niya
programme.desc: The comedy takes place at a working-class cafe located in the heart of a neighborhood, where the characters are passionate about by football, and it's always the talk of the hour, especially with the presence of Mahmoud and Al Kushi, two ex-footballers fighting over glory.

programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile
programme.desc: The crimes of Ted Bundy told from the perspective of his longtime girlfriend, Elizabeth Kloepfer, who refused to believe the truth about him for years.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: With the latest criminal they caught promising to return from the dead, detective Sherlock Holmes and his trusted companion Dr. Watson face a new mystery when the criminal, Lord Blackwood, seemingly returns from the dead with plans to befall all of England.

programme.title: Ordeal by Innocence
programme.desc: On Christmas in 1954, Wealthy philanthropist Rachel Argyll is killed in her family's home, Sunny Point. Her adopted son, Jack is arrested for killing her, but he strongly protests trying to prove his innocence.

programme.title: I Will Find You a Better Home
Can You Keep a Secret?
programme.desc: Fearing a plane crash, the drunk Emma confesses her deepest secrets to the man sitting next to her who turns out to be her company's CEO. As love blossoms between them, Emma struggles with their uneven relationship born out of him knowing everything about her, and her knowing nothing about him.

programme.title: I Will Find You a Better Home
Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes, the brightest and funniest man in the room, together with his friend Dr. Watson, tries to bring down their toughest foe, Professor Moriarty.

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
programme.desc: As the vampire death dealer, Selene tries to ward off the brutal attacks of both the Lycans and the Vampire faction that betrayed her, who both strive to get her blood to create a powerful hybrid, she has to work hard with her only two allies, David and Thomas, to stop them and thwart their plot.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: With the latest criminal they caught promising to return from the dead, detective Sherlock Holmes and his trusted companion Dr. Watson face a new mystery when the criminal, Lord Blackwood, seemingly returns from the dead with plans to befall all of England.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes, the brightest and funniest man in the room, together with his friend Dr. Watson, tries to bring down their toughest foe, Professor Moriarty.

programme.desc: As the vampire death dealer, Selene tries to ward off the brutal attacks of both the Lycans and the Vampire faction that betrayed her, who both strive to get her blood to create a powerful hybrid, she has to work hard with her only two allies, David and Thomas, to stop them and thwart their plot.

programme.title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile

programme.title: Gangster Squad

programme.title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
programme.desc: In the small town of Wardenclyffe, everyone is excitedly waiting for Halloween, when best friends Sonny and Sam go to a deserted house where they find an old manuscript. Once they open it Slappy is released from his captivity and plans to turn Halloween upside down.

programme.title: Portreh
programme.desc: On the recommendation of his father's former sweetheart, Hazem becomes the editor-in-chief of an economic magazine. As he falls in love with Rima, the niece of his father's ex, trouble soon follows since an old feud has Hazem's parents and Rima at odds over the history with Randa.

programme.title: Eursan akhar zman
programme.desc: In each episode of the series, a groom proposes to marry Hikmat, the beautiful, educated young woman, who holds a doctorate in pharmacy and owns a pharmacy in the capital. As she comes from a well-off family, she is not in a hurry to choose a suitor from among the many men who ask for her hand.

programme.title: Return My Morning
programme.desc: Love brings together a successful man, Nabil, who has been searching for love a lot, and Raneem. Throughout the series, we see their extremely romantic story and also monitor their attitudes and interactions with their social surroundings.

programme.title: Al-Zahir Baibars
programme.desc: The life and exploits of al-Zahir Baibars, Sultan of Egypt and the Levant, his journey from being a slave to Prince Ala’ al-Din al-Bunduqari, until he became sultan, and the many important events he was involved in, like the fall of Baghdad at the hands of Mongol commander Hulagu Khan, and the battle of Ain Jalut.

programme.title: Torjoman El-Ashwak
programme.desc: The show tells the story of three friends who decide to adopt the left-wing ideology. After each goes their way, one of them starts taking up Sufism and one maintains his leftist principles, which gets him into a lot of trouble. The third one decides to leave Syria, but returns after the civil war to find his missing daughter.

programme.title: 350 Gram
programme.desc: The life of Noah El Rayyes, a cunning lawyer who manipulates the law, is turned upside down after he suffers from a health condition that leads him to undergo a heart transplant surgery from a donor, as the events unfold.

programme.title: Eursan akhar zman

programme.title: Sabaya 6
programme.desc: In season 6, new interesting adventures await the five girls who used to live together in one house, but this time after they go through marriage experiences and enter the world of motherhood.

programme.title: Shaware' El-Sham El-Ateqa
programme.desc: The tribulations of the "Abu Arab" family and their lives in an old, small town in Damascus.

programme.title: Nasl El Aghrab
programme.desc: In the wake of a fight that left half the members of Ghefran and Assaf's families dead, the latter is released from prison to try and restore the balance of power between him and his archenemy Gherfan, especially as the latter had married Assaf's beloved ex-wife and raised his son.

programme.title: Without Restraint (Ep3)
programme.desc: Drama, Romance 2021 Ghazal is trapped in an unwanted marriage to a controlling businessman due to his power and her family's passiveness. However, everything changes when her heart and Seif El Khedewy's heart are united by fearless love. Yasmin Abd Al Aziz, Ahmed Al Awady, Khaled Al Sawy, Dina Fouaad, Khaled Sarhan, Amr Mahmoud Yasin, Mustafa Fikry

programme.title: Souq Al-Harir
programme.desc: The series sheds light on the period between 1950 and 1960 in Syria, with a focus on certain social stories, including that of Gharib who lost his memory as a child and is trying to find his way back to his family, and Omran who is a polygamist merchant living with his mother.

programme.title: Margaret (Ep8)
programme.desc: People, Drama 2021 A British woman of Arab origins lives in the Gulf society and many situations happen to her because of some Arab behaviors. Hayat Al Fahed , Hassan Al Balam, Soaad Ali, Hamad AlOmani, Heba Aldurri, Basel Al Khatib, Muhammad Shams

programme.title: Be My Sunshine
programme.desc: On Swallow Island, the paths of businesswoman Haziran and gorgeous young man Poyraz collide, and love blossoms as a result of their conflicting personalities.

programme.title: Closer Than The Soul (Ep18)
programme.desc: People, Drama 2019 After gathering, friendship and affection between four families, the differences now are dividing them. Hussein Al Mansour, Bassema Hamada, Mashary Al Balam, Mahmoud Boushahri, Abdul Rahman Al Salman, Al Hanouf

programme.title: She Looks Great (Ep71)
programme.desc: Drama, Bollywood, Romance 2021 Priya lives in her family home with her mother and sisters. She suffers in her life and believes that there is no place for love in her, after her lover left her to marry her sister. Nakuul Mehta, Disha Parmar, Amit Singh Thakur, Rohan Kapoor, Alefia Kapadia, Ekta Kapoor, Sahir Raza

programme.title: Elle Maloush Kbeer
programme.desc: As Ghazal's father forces her to marry a wealthy businessman despite the big age difference between them, the circumstances force her to toughen up in order to deal with those around her, as she gets to know the young man Seif El Khedewy and falls for him.

programme.title: Progeny Of Al Aghrab (Ep3)
programme.desc: Thriller, People, Drama 2021 Presenting the story of a man from upper Egypt who is accused of murder; after spending jail time, he returns to revenge from his worst enemies. Amir Karara, Ahmed El Sakka, Mai Omar, Ahmed Malek, Ahmad Dash, Mohamed Samy, Mohamed Samy

programme.title: Margaret
programme.desc: A British woman marries a Khaleeji and lives in Arab society. After her husband's death, she becomes responsible for her family, as her life intertwines with the lives of those around her, and many clashes occur due to her unfamiliarity with some Arab traditions.

programme.title: Silk Market (Ep5)
programme.desc: Drama 2020 Life in Damascus varies over the fifties and sixties, As the brothers, Omran and Ghareeb separate after the latter suffers a traffic accident that makes him lose his memory while his brother lives in stability and harmony among the family. programme.title: Minny We Finy
programme.desc: A drama series that monitors a range of social issues, between three families, Mashal, Mohamed and Sa'd who have a strong neighborly relationship, despite their different culture and social classes.

programme.title: Be My Sunshine (Ep57)
programme.desc: Romance, Comedy 2021 Hazira travels to a remote island to explore a land her bosses want to take to establish a resort. She meets Poyraz, a young man who owns a small olive factory. programme.title: Chrysalis
programme.desc: Nalan is a beautiful girl, who wins everyone's love with her kindness. She graduated with honors from the best schools in Turkey, however, she does not know anything about her parents except that her parents died in a car accident when she was young. She works as an interior architect at Koroglu Company, which owns an international hotel chain. Nalan meets the owner's son in the cafeteria, and it seems that this meeting will be the beginning of major transformations in their lives.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae Deian yn llyncu mul ar ôl colli mewn gêm fwrdd, ac mae'n tyfu cynffon a chlustiau. Deian sulks after losing a board game against Loli, and starts to grow a Donkey's tail and ears!

programme.title: Oi! Osgar
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Oscar y fadfall a'i ffrindiau yn yr anialwch chwilboeth. A cartoon following the adventures of Oscar and friends in the arid desert - as they try not to die of boredom!

programme.title: Siwrne Ni
programme.desc: Mae Dyfan wrthi'n gwneud gwaith pwysig yn cludo pecynnau bwyd i'w banc bwyd lleol, Glanaman. Dyfan is on an important journey, delivering food parcels for his local food bank in Glanaman.

programme.title: Dyffryn Mwmin
programme.desc: Wedi'i gynhyrfu gan Mrs Ffilijonc, mae Mwmintada yn penderfynu chwilio am swydd, gan obeithio gosod esiampl well i'w fab. Moomintada's daily absence starts to affect the whole Moomin family.

programme.title: Larfa
programme.desc: What's happening in the Larfa world today? Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Larfa heddiw?

programme.title: Bwystfil
programme.desc: O gewri mawr i bryfed bach - mae gan yr anifeiliaid yma gryfder i wneud pethau rhyfeddol: cyfrwn lawr deg o'r cryfaf yn y byd. We count down 10 of the strongest animals in the world.

programme.title: Dennis a Dannedd
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri gyda'r direidus Dennis a Dannedd. Fun and games with the mischievous Dennis and Gnashers.

programme.title: Byd Rwtsh Dai Potsh
programme.desc: Mae John yn ffeindio cyfrifiadur o'r enw Nel mewn sgip ond mae gan Nel feddwl ei hun ac mae'n llwytho fideo gogleisiol o Beti a'i rhannu ar y we. George finds a computer named Val in a skip!

programme.title: LEGO® DREAMZzz
programme.desc: Er mwyn creu eu clociau tywod eu hunain a dod yn Gwsgarwyr swyddogol ar gyfer y Noswylfa rhaid i Mateo drechu Meistr yr Efail Rithiau. Mateo & friends must defeat the Dream Forge guardian.

programme.title: Prosiect Z
programme.desc: A fydd y 5 disgybl dewr yn dianc neu'n cael eu troi yn Zeds? Heddiw mae'r Zeds yn Ysgol Llangynwyd. Will the five pupils escape or be turned into Zeds? Today, we're in Ysgol Llangynwyd.

programme.title: Teulu'r Castell
programme.desc: Pennod 2. Mae Marian yn trafod ei chynllun i gynnal cyrsiau preswyl i gleientiaid ac mae'r teulu yn rhoi stamp eu hunain ar y castell. Marian looks at plans to hold retreats for her clients. [SL]

programme.title: Trefi Gwyllt Iolo
programme.desc: Bydd Iolo yn darganfod ystlumod yn cysgu mewn ty hanesyddol yn Rhuthun a robin goch yn canu drwy'r nos ym Mangor. Iolo comes across bats, a noisy robin and alien toads in Welsh towns. [SL]

programme.title: Cymry ar Gynfas
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae'r artist Seren Morgan Jones, sy'n enwog am ei phortreadau cryf o fenywod, yn paentio'r cerddor Kizzy Crawford. Artist Seren Morgan Jones paints singer Kizzy Crawford. [SL]

programme.title: Cymry ar Gynfas Seren Morgan Jones a Kizzy - Season 2, Episode 5
Ffermio
programme.desc: Ymweliad ag Emily Jones o Benuwch, sy'n angerddol iawn am y diwydiant amaeth. Melanie learns about a YFC fitness community & Meinir meets the President of the Welsh Black Cattle Association. [SL]

programme.title: Bwyd Epic Chris
programme.desc: Trwy ailddarganfod hen ryseitiau Cymreig, mae Chris yn profi bod gan y wlad gymaint mwy i'w chynnig. Chris revamps Wales' food identity by adding a modern twist to some long-lost recipes. [SL]

programme.title: Bwyd Epic Chris Bwyd Hanesyddol - Season 3, Episode 6
Ein Llwybrau Celtaidd
programme.desc: Sir 5 ar y daith yw Sir Gâr, Sir Gaerfyrddin. Awn i Gaerfyrddin, Llanelli, Talacharn, Llansteffan, Mynydd Du, Drefach a Llandysul. We end our journey in Carmarthenshire and Ceredigion. [SL]

programme.title: Ein Llwybrau Celtaidd Sir Caerfyrddin - Ceredigion - Season 1, Episode 3
Ceffylau, Sheikhs a Chowbois
programme.desc: Teithia Sue ac Emrys i Abu Dhabi i weld Rod y mab wrth ei waith i'r teulu brenhinol ar yr ynys breifat. Sue and Emrys' son competes in a show with over £10m dirhams prize money up for grabs. [SL]

programme.title: Ffasiwn Drefn
programme.desc: Mae'r cyflwynydd Lara Catrin a'r trefnydd proffesiynol Gwenan Rosser yn rhoi trefn ar gwpwrdd dillad Alys Mererid y tro hwn. This, we tackle Alys Mererid's wardrobe, in Cardiff. [SL]

programme.title: Ffasiwn Drefn Alys Caerdydd - Season 1, Episode 2
Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Mae Trystan ac Emma'n helpu criw o deulu a ffrindiau Enfys a Jamie o Gaernarfon. After getting engaged on a Gondola in Venice, Enfys and Jamie are keen to bring a taste of Italy to Wales. [SL]

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil Enfys & Jamie - Season 1, Episode 1
Sgwrs dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Mae Elin Fflur yn mwynhau sgwrs glyd gyda'r gantores, actores a chyflwynwraig enwog, Caryl Parry Jones. Elin Fflur chats with renowned Welsh singer, actress and presenter, Caryl Parry Jones. [SL]

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer Caryl Parry Jones
Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd
programme.desc: Tro hwn, bydd rhai ryseitiau traddodiadol yn creu traddodiadau newydd yn y gegin. Colleen Ramsey looks at food nostalgia. This time we see her creating some new traditions in the kitchen. [SL]

programme.title: Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd Traddodiadau Newydd - Season 2, Episode 3
Dan Do
programme.desc: Y tro hwn: hen gartref Twm o'r Nant yn Llandeilo sy' bellach yn berchen i Eiluned a Dafydd. We feature a house that belonged to Twm o'r Nant in Llandeilo, now owned by Eiluned and Dafydd.

programme.title: Dan Do Ty Eiluned a Dafydd- Llandeilo - Season 2, Episode 6
Sgorio: Met Caerdydd v Caernarfon
programme.desc: Met Caerdydd v Caernarfon yw'r gêm fyw allweddol yn y ras i sicrhau'r chweched safle. C/G 17.15. Cardiff Met v Caernarfon Town is the live match in the race for 6th position. EC. K/O 17.15.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Rygbi Ewrop: Caerdydd v Harlequins
programme.desc: Gêm Cwpan Pencampwyr Investec rhwng Rygbi Caerdydd a Harlequins. Parc yr Arfau, C/G 8.00pm. Investec Champions Cup game between Cardiff Rugby and Harlequins. Cardiff Arms Park, K/0 8.00pm.

programme.title: Radio Fa'ma
programme.desc: Pobl Y Rhondda sy'n rhannu straeon wrth i Tara Bethan a Kris Hughes yrru carafan Radio Fa'ma i Dreorci ar gyfer rhaglen radio sy' hefyd yn rhaglen deledu. This time, the pair are in Rhondda.

programme.title: Radio Fa'ma Y Rhondda - Season 1, Episode 2
Der' Dramor 'Da Fi!
programme.desc: Mae pedwar person sydd erioed wedi cwrdd yn teithio dramor i Barcelona i arwain eu teithiau diwrnod arbennig eu hunain. Four strangers travel to Barcelona for a daytripping competition.

programme.title: Der' Dramor 'Da Fi! Barcelona - Season 1, Episode 1
